examples.example: 虽然经常加班，但我依然充满热情地完成工作。

translate.english: Although often working overtime, I still complete the work with full enthusiasm.

examples.example: 即使加班到很晚，我也毫无怨言，因为这是为了实现目标而努力。

translate.english: Even if I work overtime until very late, I have no complaints, because this is to strive for the realization of the goal.

examples.example: 为了项目能够顺利完成，大家都主动加班，团结一心朝着目标迈进。

translate.english: In order to successfully complete the project, everyone takes the initiative to work overtime and is united as one to move towards the goal.
